morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happens (Aorist Imperative does not indicating any tense)
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are a person or thing being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly happen - by a person or thing being discussed
